CustomField.formula: if( text(Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Kolkata', 'PPLCU'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'MRN'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),if( text(Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Gurugram', 'PPLHO'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'MRN'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),'Please select warehouse.'))
CustomField.label: MRN Number
